archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.7: Web Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) should be managed by deploying an API management tool to centralise creation, testing, configuration and ongoing operational support, or using an API gateway offered by third parties.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
